GXNumbers.DIDBuyAgreementDetails: By pressing Buy button, your account will be charged for the amout of the service and service will be renewed monthly unless you cancel it. You can cancel subscription anytime in the 'My Numbers' control panel.
GXNumbers.DIDBuySucceedDetails:
You have successfully added phone number:%@ 
 You can cancel this subscription anytime. To keep the subscription active, you need to have enough balance in your account.
GXNumbers.DeleteGreetingAlert_message: If you delete your custom greeting message, it will roll back to system default greeting message.
GXNumbers.EditProfile_SetImageAndDisplayName_Foote: Set a display name and an optional profile photo

NumberIsDisabled.Message: You will no longer receive calls or messages on this number till you enable it again.
NumberIsDisabled.Title: Your number is disabled

NumberIsExpired.Message: Your number has been expired and deleted.
NumberIsExpired.Title: Expired

NumberIsPending.Message: It usually takes up to 24 hours and You will be notified upon activation.
NumberIsPending.Title: Your number is pending

GXPushNotification.GXDID_CLOSE_TO_EXPIRE_AUTORENEWAL_Body: Your number will expire on '%@' however, Auto-Renewal feature of this number is not enabled. To keep your number active, go to 'My Numbers' and set Auto-Renwal option. There is no guarantee for reactivation of expired numbers.
GXPushNotification.GXDID_CLOSE_TO_EXPIRE_NOCREDIT_Body: Your number will expire on '%@' and your available credit is not enough to renew subscription to this number. Topup more credit to keep your number active. There is no guarantee for reactivation of expired numbers.
GXPushNotification.GXDID_DELETED_Body: You will no longer receive calls or messages from this number. There is a 3 days grace period to reorder and buy this number and after that the number will be released to public.
GXPushNotification.GXDID_PURCHASED_Body: Your number purchase was successful and your number is ready to use. You can place or receive call on this number like your number from Phone company. Gix mobile numbers also support SMS send and receive features as well.
GXPushNotification.GXDID_PURCHASED_PENDING_ACTIVE_Body: Your number activated and your number is ready to use. You can place or receive call on this number like your number from Phone company. Gix mobile numbers also support SMS send and receive features as well.
GXPushNotification.GXDID_PURCHASED_PENDING_CONFIG_Body: Your number purchase was successful, however, It will take up to 24 hours until your number become active. You will be notified as soon as your number become active.
GXPushNotification.GX_USER_JOINED_Body: Your contact %@ joined Gix. Be the first to say hello

AccountNotFound.Message:
If you believe your account was deleted by mistake, please provide the following information so we can investigate.

Please Only contact us if your account was disabled for not following MyGix's Community Guidelines and you believe this was a mistake. If you can't access your account for a different reason, please return to the Help Center to find the appropriate place to report your issue.
 To Access Help Center go to MyGix.com Website and Open a ticket in the support center.
AccountNotFound.Title: Attention

CognitoIdentityIdNotFound.Message:
If you believe your account was deleted by mistake, please provide the following information so we can investigate.

Please Only contact us if your account was disabled for not following MyGix's Community Guidelines and you believe this was a mistake. If you can't access your account for a different reason, please return to the Help Center to find the appropriate place to report your issue.

CognitoIdentityIdNotFound.Title: Attention

UserDisabled.Message:
If you believe your account was disabled by mistake, please provide the following information so we can investigate.

Please Only contact us if your account was disabled for not following MyGix's Community Guidelines and you believe this was a mistake. If you can't access your account for a different reason, please return to the Help Center to find the appropriate place to report your issue.

UserDisabled.Title: Attention

UserSuspended.Message:
If you believe your account was suspended by mistake, please provide the following information so we can investigate.

Please Only contact us if your account was disabled for not following MyGix's Community Guidelines and you believe this was a mistake. If you can't access your account for a different reason, please return to the Help Center to find the appropriate place to report your issue.
 To Access Help Center go to MyGix.com Website and Open a ticket in the support center.
UserSuspended.Title: Attention

Subscriptions.TopupCreditDescription_Message:
By purchasing Gix credit you will be able to buy Gix services or features.
The GIX Credit never expires and enables you to buy features or services or renew existings.

CallsTab.title: Calls
CallsTab.NoItemPlaceHolder: Your recent calls will appear here

footer.row1: Username is your identity for sending or receiving messages or used for subscribing to channels.
footer.row2: You can use a-z, 0-9 and underscores. Minimum length is 5 characters.
footer.row3: Unlike most of the popular communication applications, we do not expose or share or send your phone number or private information.
footer.row4: Your phone number is not visible to any member and exclusively used for sign up or account retrieval purposes.
footer.chatLinkTitle: This link opens a chat with you:

errors.taken: Sorry, this username is already taken.
errors.invalidLength: A username must have at least 5 and maximum 20 characters.
errors.invalidUsername: Sorry, this username is not valid.
errors.tooSoon: Sorry, you have recently changed your username. You have to wait up to 7 days.

usernameNotSet.title: Username not set yet!
usernameNotSet.message: You are just one step away from Instant Messaging and Channels. You have to setup a username to activate this feature.
usernameNotSet.details: Why? Because the internet is not a safe place. We do not want your personal information to be shared.

NoItemPlaceHolders.PhoneBook: Your Phone Book Contacts will appear here.
NoItemPlaceHolders.Chats: Your chats list will appear here.

ContactEncryptionQRCode.title: Gix Key
ContactEncryptionQRCode.message:
MyGix Accounts are secured using BCube and GixConnect encryption system.

Messages and Calls are secured with end-to-end Public/Private Key system.

GixConnect is a RSA+AES Powered Block-Chain algorithms.

Contacts.title: Contacts
Contacts.NoPhoneBookItemsPlaceHolder: Your PhoneBook Contacts will appear here

EditProfile.ImageSectionFooterTitle: Enter a name and add an optional profile photo.
EditProfile.title: Edit Profile

NoItemPlaceHolder.Message:
Your Numbers will appear here.

Purchase Phone Numbers all over the world and receive calls and messages on your phone or place calls.
You can purchase multiple numbers and manage associated services.

Archived recorded calls will appear here.
To record a conversation, press on the record button during an active call.

Your recorded calls will appear here.

To record a conversation, press on the record red button during an active call.
Your deleted voicemail will appear here

Appearance.title: Appearance
Appearance.footer: Auto mode automatically adjust to the system theme and will automatically update when your device appearance changes.

BlockedContacts.title: Blocked Contacts
BlockedContacts.NoItemPlaceHolder: Blocked Contacts can't send you messages or add you to groups or call you. they will not see your profile pictures, online and last seen status.

whoCanSee.header: Who can see my phone number
whoCanSee.footer: Users who have your number saved in their contacts will also see your phone number.

Exceptions.footer: You can add users or entire groups as exceptions that will override the settings above.

whoCanSee.footer:
You won't see Last Seen and Online status for people with whom you don't share yours.
Approximate last seen will be shown instead.
(recently, within a week, within a month)

Exceptions.footer: You can add users or entire groups as exceptions that will override the settings above.

whoCanSee.header: Who can see my Profile Photo
whoCanSee.footer: You can restrict who can see your profile photo with granular precision.

Exceptions.footer: You can add users or entire groups as exceptions that will override the settings above.

whoCanSee.footer: Choose exactly who can and can't call you.

Exceptions.footer: You can add users or entire groups as exceptions that will override the settings above.

whoCanSee.header: Who can add a link to my account when forwarding my messages
whoCanSee.footer: Messages you send will not link back to your account when forwarded by users.

Exceptions.footer: You can add users or entire groups as exceptions that will override the settings above.

whoCanSee.footer: You can restrict who can invite you to groups and channels with granular precision.

Exceptions.footer: You can add users or entire groups as exceptions that will override the settings above.

autoDeleteAccount.title: If Away For
autoDeleteAccount.footer: If you do not come online at least once within this period, your account will be deleted along with all messages and contacts.

contents.title: Additional Password
contents.detail: You can set a password that will be required when you log in on a new device in addition to the code you get in the SMS.

passActions.footer:
When you set up an additional passcode, opening application will ask you for a passcode to enter, else you will not have access to the app.
This will prevent unauthorized access to the application.

accessActions.header: Note: if you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app. All secret chats and call history will be lost.

onNoPassCode.headerDetail:
When you set up an additional passcode, opening application will ask you for a passcode to enter, else you will not have access to the app.
This will prevent unauthorized access to the application.
onNoPassCode.footer: Note: if you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app. All secret chats and call history will be lost.
